about_the_game:
In Red Is Lava, the setup is simple but unforgiving. Get ready for a challenging arcade platformer where a single mistake can be fatal! You control a cube that changes color with every jump and paints the platforms it touches, transforming the world with every move. Touch a red platform or one of a different color than yours, and you die!

With a straightforward yet addictive gameplay, you'll find yourself jumping, dodging, and adapting quickly to color changes in order to survive a world that gets more and more unforgiving after each jump.

  • Precision Platforming: In Red Is Lava, there’s no room for error. Every move counts, and each jump must be calculated with pinpoint accuracy.

  • Arcade Challenge: No complicated storylines—just pure, unadulterated action. With 64 levels full of obstacles, each one tougher than the last.

  • Minimalist Neon Visuals: The game features a clean, vibrant neon aesthetic that highlights the platforms and obstacles, making the colorful world pop.

  • Unforgiving Difficulty: If you’re a fan of tough games like Super Meat Boy and VVVVVV, Red Is Lava will be your new addiction. Get ready for a learning curve that will push your skills and patience to their limits.

  • Precise and Fluid Controls: The gameplay focuses on fast, accurate reflexes, with responsive controls that make every move feel crisp and deliberate.

  • Instant Action: Quick levels, quick deaths, and instant retries. No fluff, no story—just you, your cube, and the deadly red.
